info.name: Dark Polygon (Vox Media)
info.description:
This is a dark theme primarily for Polygon.com.

It also works mostly on other Vox Media sites as well.
  • TheVerge.com
  • RiftHerald.com
  • HeroesNeverDie.com
  • TheFlyingCourier.com
Please let me know if there are any issues.
info.additionalInfo:
v0.7 (2018-01-29):
- Added styles for collapsible guide tables.

v0.6 (2017-11-17):
- Added review scorecard additional styling.

v0.5 (2017-10-08):
- Added group description styles (heroesNeverDie, theFlyingCourier).
- Added Polygon tab bar logo style.

v0.4 (2017-10-01):
- Added style for homepage video panel.
- Added style for reviews meta info and score.
- Added border style for article images.
- Added styles for guide hub titles.
- Added gradient style to Polygon homepage grid.
- Added domains: riftherald.com, heroesneverdie.com, theflyingcourier.com.
- Added gradients to match each domain's color scheme.
- Added theverge.com comments styles.
- Added theverge.com/forums styles.
- Added styles for feedback pages.

v0.3 (2017-09-25):
- Added styles for pre-reviews.

v0.2 (2017-09-25):
- Added article quote styling.

v0.1 (2017-09-23):
- Initial release.
